name: TAURONOS
description: Trapped inside an ancient labyrinth, chased by the mythical Minotaur. Will you reach the center? And if so, what will you discover about yourself there, in the dark?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Celeron @ 1.80GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: XBox 360 controller supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
